template:
---

- name: "SAPO - Remove Files"
  hosts: all
  become: true
  vars:
    logbook: "SAPO - Remove Files"
  tasks:

    - name: "remove_files.yml"
      include_tasks: /etc/ansible/roles/remove_files.yml
    
    - name: "logbook"
      include_tasks: /etc/ansible/roles/logbook.yml
      
...
name: SAPO - Remove Files
